messages.name: SET_PEDALS_RANGE
messages.description: Syncronization message from Steering Wheel to Pedals Control Unit. Message semantic: (start|end) set of (max|min) value for (accelerator|brake|all) pedal.

messages.name: ACCELERATOR_PEDAL_VAL
messages.description: Accelerator Pedal potentiometer Value. Average of 2 sensors normalized from 0 to 255, linear, 8bit total, unsigned.

messages.name: BRAKE_PEDAL_VAL
messages.description: Brake Pedal pressure sensor Value. Normalized from 0 to 255, linear, 8bit total, unsigned.
